title: Dataset Annotation Metadata
description: An entry for a published dataset object annotation;

datasetId.description: An id associated with a dataset object; these will external or MOD IDs.

publication.description: list of publications associated with this dataset

title.description: free text title of the dataset

summary.description: free text summary or description of the dataset

numChannels.description: for microarrays, indicates the number of channels -- 1 or 2

subSeries.description: If the dataset is a SuperSeries, this is a list of dataset ids that are associated with this dataset

categoryTags.description: list of controlled vocabulary text to describe the experiment

dateAssigned.description: Date of curation/assigned by the MOD.
